title: Can't play?
body: So first off when I signed in and signed up for an aram, everything went normally until it went to game load screen. Instead of going to the game load screen it kept the client and just went straight to "skip waiting for stats" and that's all I could do. Tried closing league and reopening it, which it wouldn't open. Restarted PC and opened it again only for it to randomly load half a patch. That completed and now if I click "find match" in any game mode nothing happens, won't queue up. Anyone else having any similar issues?

replies.body: Edit seems to be ok now. Did change the party setting to closed, unsure if that made the difference or not.

It's a new one on me. If it happens again I'd definitely recommend [submitting a ticket to player support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), but it sounds lie you might have just had some client and/or connection hiccups.
